column4: Is there a command to check which partitions are encrypted for an lvm managed disk?

i personally like "unmount *spesific partition*" then "mount *spesific partition*", then opening natulus. It has worked for me. If it gives a read error, you know its encrypted, and all you have to do to restore it is reboot.
yeeeah, I'm gunna go ahead and say there's a better way
it works, wether or not its good is a different matter.
